#labels Phase-Deploy
== Plugins ==

Following plugins are available for ZFDebug, you can combine them how you need them

=== Plugin List ===
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Auth Auth]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Cache Cache]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Database Database]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Exception Exception]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_File File]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Memory Memory]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Registry Registry]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Text Text]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Time Time]
  * [Documentation_Plugin_Variables Variables]
  
Your are missing a plugin? Just write an [http://code.google.com/p/zfdebug/issues/entry issue]
and tell us. Feel free to submit own Plugins, we will add them to the project.
